statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, first_name, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE id < 100;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 10
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM sensitive_data WHERE last_name = 'Smith'
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE last_name <> 'Doe' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE encrypted_credit_card IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, encrypted_ssn FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, encrypted_ssn, first_name, last_name FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, first_name AS 'First Name', last_name AS 'Last Name', encrypted_ssn AS 'SSN' FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM sensitive_data WHERE encrypted_ssn IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE encrypted_ssn = 'encrypted_value_1'
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY last_name
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE first_name LIKE '%a%'
SELECT id, encrypted_ssn FROM sensitive_data JOIN encryption_keys ON sensitive_data.id = encryption_keys.key_id
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information ORDER BY column1 DESC;
SELECT column1, column3 FROM sensitive_information WHERE column2 = 'example';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE column1 = 5;
SELECT column2 FROM sensitive_information WHERE column3 = TRUE;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM sensitive_information WHERE column1 > 10 ORDER BY column2 DESC;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM sensitive_information WHERE column1 < 100 AND column3 = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data JOIN encryption_keys ON encrypted_data.data_id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address_line1, city, state FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT total_amount, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT u.username, a.city FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.id = a.user_id;
SELECT o.id, o.order_date, c.card_number FROM orders o JOIN credit_cards c ON o.user_id = c.user_id WHERE o.status = 'completed';
SELECT u.username, o.order_date, cc.card_number FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id JOIN credit_cards cc ON u.id = cc.user_id WHERE o.total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username, password FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM addresses ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.postal_code FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.description FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.order_id WHERE o.total_amount > 100;
SELECT c.card_number, c.expiration_date, c.cvv, u.username FROM credit_cards c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
